item.title: 5 Lessons I Learned from the 30 Day Meditation Challenge
item.description: Amir Motlagh I had struggled with a bit of anxiety and restlessness ever since I quit my job last year. I had received suggestions from many people to try meditation, but I was over-sceptical considering the scent of spirituality it had. But then I happened to read a Twitter thread by Naval Ravikant. Naval is someone who I admire a lot and his ideas and philosophies resonate a lot with me.
